title: Trump MAGA Meme Coins Are the First Experiment in 'PoliFi'
description: One part community, one part prediction market, the meme coin with the former president's namesake is a troll project that became serious, its marketing director told CoinDesk in an interview.

title: Hungary Issues Draft Law Allowing Banks To Offer Crypto Services
description: The bill aims to establish a comprehensive regulatory framework for cryptocurrencies and other digital assets and revolutionize the country’s financial sector.

title: Dave Ramsey’s crypto caution – Should you listen? Experts debate
description: Dave Ramsey, a renowned financial guru and CEO of Ramsey Solutions, has expressed skepticism about cryptocurrencies, labeling them as “risky business.”  His stance on digital assets highlights concerns about its volatility and speculative nature.  However, while Ramsey’s viewpoint carries weight in personal finance circles, it’s essential to consider broader perspectives within the crypto community. title: SuperAI, Asia’s Premier Artificial Intelligence Conference, Debuts in Singapore
description: Edward Snowden, Benedict Evans and Balaji Srinivasan amongst others to take the stage at SuperAI from 5-6 June 2024 SINGAPORE — 10 January 2024 — SuperAI, Asia’s premier artificial intelligence (AI) conference, announced today its upcoming global debut in Singapore. title: Nigerian government denies $10 billion Binance fine rumor
description: A representative from the Nigerian government has addressed rumors regarding a potential $10 billion fine for the global cryptocurrency exchange Binance. Bayo Onanuga, the Special Adviser to the Nigerian President on Information and Strategy, has refuted claims initially reported by the BBC, asserting that the allegations resulted from a misquotation. The clarification emerged following the […]

title: Binance Coin (BNB) and NEAR Pump by Double-Digits as Market Shows Uptrend; Rebel Satoshi ($RBLZ) Aligns With Bullish Market Momentum
description: BNB bulls expect surges above $480. title: VeChain dApp Ecosystem Grows: VeBetterDAO Launches Voting Rounds – Claim $B3TR Airdrops & Swap for $VOT3
description: VeChain and BCG teamed up to launch VeBetterDAO, aiming to make Web3.0 more sustainable and engaging. The platform introduces ‘B3TR’ and ‘VOT3’ tokens to reward users for participation, driving the adoption of decentralized applications. title: FTX Warns Against Unauthorized Third Parties’ Intervention in Asset Sale
description:
FTX reiterates Galaxy Asset Management as the exchange’s sole authorized intermediary to sell FTX’s crypto portfolio. The exchange warns against unauthorized third-party attempts to intervene in selling FTX’s digital assets. The platform previously requested the court to appoint Galaxy as its advisor, considering the asset manager’s vast experience. The bankrupt crypto exchange FTX has officially […]
